text: NGC 3001 is a magnitude 11.83 spiral galaxy in the constellation Antlia, discovered on 30 March 1835 by John Herschel. It has a recessional velocity of per second, and is located around 115 million light years away. NGC 3001 has an apparent size of 4.3 by 3.1 arcminutes and is about 145 thousand light years across. == References == == External links == * Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1835 Category:Discoveries by John Herschel Category:Galaxies discovered in 1835 3001 Category:Open clusters Category:Antlia
title: NGC 3001
